abstract: Haruna Abdulkarim Lukman (born 4 December 1990) is a Nigerian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ukrainian side Dynamo Kyiv and the national team.
comment: Haruna Abdulkarim Lukman (born 4 December 1990) is a Nigerian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ukrainian side Dynamo Kyiv and the national team.
